value.name: There is Only One Kevin Clayton…But We Need One in Every Company
value.description: This piece was developed with guidance and input from the Living Cities Narrative Change Working Group, a collective impact consortium composed of foundations, financial institutions and key partners working to harness market forces for economic inclusion by shifting corporate narratives about racial equity.
